name: Garchomp ex
author: 5ban Graphics
tera_effect: As long as this Pokémon is on your Bench, prevent all damage done to this Pokémon by attacks (both yours and your opponent’s).

attacks.name: Hydro Lander
attacks.effect: Attach up to 3 Basic {F} Energy cards from your discard pile to your Benched Pokémon in any way you like.

attacks.name: Sonic Dive
attacks.effect: Discard 2 Energy from this Pokémon. This attack does 120 damage to 1 of your opponent’s Pokémon. (Don’t apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

rule_box: When your Pokémon ex is Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.
